title: [LFP] Decent Support needed for Ranked DUO
body:
So looking for a decent support as i am at the end of my thread of patience for janna's that don't know how to use or when to use their shield, or ult.. or whirlwind.. or thresh's that just.. can't thresh... I'm a bot main, meaning i have played thousands of games both as adc and support and will be able to trial someone who's play style suits mine, or vice versa (as said playstyle is flexible)

Currently Plat5 55LP and looking for a support that is within duo range (rank doesn't mean much to me thus im happy to DUO with even bronze, as long as they know their stuff and don't go full retard)

Add me in-game and let's see how far we can go.

replies.body:
Hey, I'm happy to play a game or 2 to see if we have a matching play style, support is my 2nd main and i manly play thresh,janna,leo.
IGN: Kitty katt
